name: Heroes in VIBE
description:
The VIBE Corporation is out to make the best Food Cubes in the world, and they need your help! All you have to do is all the work. But don't worry! There's fresh bread ready in place of your paycheck. Why get paid when you can have delicious, mouth-watering, chewy, stretchy, tasty bread? So come on down to the concrete palace and work that pesky freedom away!
(This game is very heavily inspired by my frustration as an activist. Think of it as venting in game jam form.)
